text: Sylvia Leticia Martínez Elizondo (20 November 1947 - 9 July 2020) was a Mexican politician. She was born in Chihuahua City, Chihuahua. She was a member of the National Action Party. Between 2016 to 2018, Martínez Elizondo was a Senator from Chihuahua. Martínez Elizondo died on 9 July 2020 in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon at the age of 72.Murió Silvia Martínez, esposa de Memo Luján ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Chihuahua (state)
title: Sylvia Martínez Elizondo
